creator: engelen@mail.fleetboard.com
text:
hi,
Tomcat 4.0.4 seems to have problems with the presentation of German Umlaute (ä,ö,ü) in JSP-
pages. They are shown always as a question mark. It seems that this problem just occurs if the data 
comes from a database (I recognized it with MySql 3.23.49-nt).

cu,
stefan

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
This is difficult to reproduce. Maybe there could be a problem with the b2c or
c2b conversion done when storing / retrieving the data in the database ?
IMO, you should investigate this further (more "basic" i18n scenarios work
fine). Reopen the bug if you have more details indicating a problem with Tomcat.
